hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{9} \text{ with stripes}\\
+&  \underline{\blue5 \text{ with spots}}\\
=&\pink{14} \text{ sea monsters in all}\end{align}$

question.content:
I saw $9$ sea monsters with stripes and $5$ others with spots. 

**How many sea monsters did I see? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] sea monsters
